author: gnodet
msg: Various improvements in OSGi: avoid the strong dependency on Woden by using an inner class to capture the imports packages, use the HttpConfiguration through the OSGi config admin, cache interceptor chains for a given soap marshaler

author: elecharny
msg: Replaced a reference to 1.5.3 by a reference to 1.5.4-SNAPSHOT

author: gnodet
msg: Add back the needed OSGi imports statements, allow the ExecutorFactory to be configured on the component directly

author: rdonkin
msg: MIME4J-55 introduced an IllegalArgumentException. Though this is unlikely to be thrown, it would be unfriendly for a RuntimeException to be propogated. Document the throw, catch the runtime in the caller and wrap in a checked exception.
